actions.text: Mr. Regula raised a point of order against the Obey amendment (A014). Mr. Regula stated that the amendment constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Obey to the Shadegg amendment (A013).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Obey to the Shadegg amendment (A013).

amends_amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the title V education block grant program.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment for "school improvement programs" for innovative programs, as authorized by part A of title V of the Elementary and Secondary Educatino Act of 1965, and the amount otherwise provided by the Act for "education and the disadvantaged" is hereby reduced by, $20,000,000.

purpose: An amendment to add at the end of the bill a new section which seeks to reduce by $125 the amount of tax reduction for taxpayers with an adjusted gross income in excess of $1,000,000.
